text: Moustapha Niasse (born November 4, 1939Profile at Alliance des Forces de Progr√®s website .) is a Senegalese politician. He has been the President of the National Assembly since 2012. He was in the government of Senegal as Foreign Minister of Senegal from 1978 to 1984 and again from 1993 to 1998. He was Prime Minister of Senegal for a few weeks in 1983, and he held that position again from 2000 to 2001. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Senegal
title: Moustapha Niasse
